name: TagPlay Multiplayer
description:
TagPlay Play the good old day's game!

The game is in its alpha state, so kindly test it and report bugs(there should be. :) )

The UI is not currently great but i will fix it as soon as i can.

Controls:-

PC- 

1. WASD/Arrows for movement

2. Use LMB to kick and RMB to punch

You're ready to go!

Android-

1. Joystic movement

2. UI punch and kick

The gameplay is very simple:-

-Connect to a nearby server.

-The creator and Joiner should be connected in the same region! (eg. India, Australia, Canada. etc)

-You will be Joining/Creating or Random Joining a room.

-You should set a nickname.

-After joining you should spawn to the Playground.

-After getting 6 players in a room, the game will start in 3 secs.

-After starting the game no one can join the room(if a player leaves too)

-The catcher will be selected randomly.

-The catcher needs to Tag all the players in order to win before the Countdown ends.

-If else the players will win.

Anyone who like to join the event please reply here or you can join the discord server.

Thank You

#muscis from

Afternoon Nap by Ghostrifter Official | https://soundcloud.com/ghostrifter-official
